To any on the crew of the Odyssey. I am doing well. My pod was on its way to Overworld when I passed by a planet not on our star maps. Which begs the question, why is it hidden? How did we not find it before? Why has no one else in histoy found it?

I changed course and went down to investigate. The planet is fascinating, full of creatures large and small and very diverse. I have found structures which suggest sentient and civilized lifeforms. I'm going to make contact to see if I can learn more about this place. I believe I saw a trader or merchant of some sort as I landed.
